sentences.sContent: Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat (=  seat next to the aisle  ) ?
sentences.sCn: 您想要靠窗的座位还是靠过道的座位？

phrases.pCn: [口语] 沿教堂走道而去(至圣坛举行婚礼)

remMethod.val: ai(看作air， 空气) ＋ sle → 让空气流通的道 → 通道

trans.tranOther: a long passage between rows of seats in a church, plane, theatre etc, or between rows of shelves in a shop
